Source.Name: subtitle-editor
Source.Description: Alt yazıyı düzenlemeye, yeniden oluşturmaya, ses ile altyazıyı senkronize etmeye yaran altyazı yöneticisidir.
Source.Summary: Subtitle Editor is a GTK+2 tool to edit subtitles for GNU/Linux/*BSD.
Source.Description: Subtitle Editor is a GTK+2 tool to edit subtitles for GNU/Linux/*BSD. It can be used for new subtitles or as a tool to transform, edit, correct and refine existing subtitle. This program also shows sound waves, which makes it easier to synchronise subtitles to voices.
